tool_description: Analyzes laboratory test results and biomarkers to identify health risks and abnormalities relevant to life insurance underwriting.

test_results.description: Array of lab test names and their corresponding values

test_values.description: Array of numeric values corresponding to each test result

test_units.description: Array of measurement units for each test value

reference_ranges.description: Array of normal reference ranges for each test

test_date.description: Date when lab tests were conducted

applicant_age.description: Age of the insurance applicant in years

applicant_gender.description: Gender of the applicant: male, female, other

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: test_results, test_values, and test_units arrays must have the same length.
Invalid test values: All test_values must be valid numbers.
Invalid gender: Use one of [male, female, other].
Invalid age: applicant_age must be between 18 and 100.
Invalid test date: Provide a valid date-time string for test_date.
Unrecognized test name: One or more test names in test_results are not recognized.
usage: Provide arrays of test names, values, and units along with applicant demographics. The tool analyzes results against age and gender-specific reference ranges and identifies concerning values.

abnormal_results.description: List of test results that fall outside normal ranges

risk_indicators.description: Health risk categories suggested by the lab results

severity_scores.description: Numeric severity scores for each abnormal result (0-10 scale)

follow_up_recommendations.description: Suggested additional tests or medical evaluations needed
